username.description: This can be a Cluster-scoped or SVM-scoped account, depending on whether a Cluster-level or SVM-level API is required. For more information, please read the documentation U(https://goo.gl/BRu78Z).

name.description: The name of the volume to manage.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the ONTAP instance.

size_unit.description: The unit used to interpret the size parameter.

vserver.description: Name of the vserver to use.

state.description: Whether the specified volume should exist or not.

online.description: Whether the specified volume is online, or not.

infinite.description: Set True if the volume is an Infinite Volume.

aggregate_name.description: The name of the aggregate the flexvol should exist on. Required when C(state=present).

size.description: The size of the volume in (size_unit). Required when C(state=present).
